parameters.name: CrossAccountRoleName
parameters.description: The name of the RAM role that is created within the source Alibaba Cloud account and assigned to the current Alibaba Cloud account to authorize the current Alibaba Cloud account to back up data across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: CrossAccountType
parameters.description:
Specifies whether data is backed up within the same Alibaba Cloud account or across Alibaba Cloud accounts. Valid values:

*   SELF_ACCOUNT: Data is backed up within the same Alibaba Cloud account.
*   CROSS_ACCOUNT: Data is backed up across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: CrossAccountUserId
parameters.description: The UID of the source account used for cross-account backup.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the backup. The value must be a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of rows that you want the current query to return.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is required to obtain the next page of backup snapshots.

parameters.name: OtsInstances
parameters.description: The Tablestore instances that are backed up.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the backup. The value must be a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.
